ssh

Class SshExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ssh.SshExecutor

  • public class SshExecutor
extends java.lang.Object
    SshExecutor executes ssh command. User need to set command for host and then execute it. It is recommended to call IODone() after reading whole output. It is also recommened to call this function if no reading is performed.
    passpharse for rsa file will be used only in every connection of instance.
    Note that given password may be used for other username@hosts than the password was asked for.
    After finishing all exections disconnect() should be called.
    Author:
    Ivan Straka
